<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get an access policy</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/iam/v1/access_policies/{id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Get an access policy by ID.


## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"description":"Access policy's unique identifier.\n","in":"path","name":"id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Successful response - returns a single `access_policy`.

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"principal"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The email address of the user or service account that is granted this\naccess policy.\n","example":"username@paloaltonetworks.com","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"principal_display_name"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"_firstname lastname_ OR _firstname_ OR _username_.\n","example":"username","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"principal_type"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Whether the principal is a user or a service account.\n","example":"user","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"resource"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The resource to which this access policy is assigned. It is in the format:\n\n  `prn:<TSG_ID>::::`\n","example":"prn:123::::","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"role"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The [role](/sase/docs/all-roles) used for this access policy.\n","example":"superuser","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"principal\": \"username@paloaltonetworks.com\",\n  \"principal_display_name\": \"username\",\n  \"principal_type\": \"user\",\n  \"resource\": \"prn:123::::\",\n  \"role\": \"superuser\"\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
